alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Lawrence; Newton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 2:14AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Cherokee, Newton, northwestern Lawrence and Jasper Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 214 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds along a line extending from Golden City to near Carl Junction to 6 miles southwest of Chetopa. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Joplin... Carthage... Neosho... Webb City... Carl Junction... Baxter Springs... Columbus... Galena... Oronogo... Seneca... Granby... Carterville... Duquesne... Sarcoxie... Duenweg... Jasper... Diamond... Loma Linda... Airport Drive... Leawood... This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 between mile markers 0 and 42. Interstate 49 between mile markers 15 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
